value:
Prince Alfonse is far too kind. Yes,
kindness is a virtue. But sometimes...$k$pNo, forgive me. It is not my place to
speak.

I serve the royal family of Renais. All
I want is to protect Prince Ephraim
and Princess Eirika.

There must be some tasks you can
delegate to me. You must reserve
your strength for where it is needed.$k$pThis is not simply for your benefit.
It is for the sake of the entire army.

Do not trouble yourself over my well-
being. I would play the pawn gladly,
would it bring us victory.

I spent the day in training. That has
been my habit ever since I was a
young squire.

Pardon me. I was entrusted with the
task of bringing you a greeting by
$Nf.

Now is not the time to rest. I must
set my sights on a loftier peak.

Further training is required—that
much is sure.

I'll just have to step up my training
to compensate for this.

You'll see my gratitude in each
and every swing of my sword.

I am Seth, a knight of Renais. I must
beg your pardon, but...are Princess
Eirika and Prince Ephraim here?

I must express my gratitude for
your leadership. As a knight, all I ask
for is an opportunity to serve.$k$pHowever, permit me to say just one
thing.$k$pFeelings have no place on the
battlefield. You issue orders. I obey
them. That is all.$k$pIn battle, a life-or-death moment could
come at any time. Emotions could
cloud your judgment.$k$pIf my mind was on you instead of
the opponent before me, that could
end up costing us a victory.$k$pSo I must ask that you keep your
distance. This will ensure that I can
continue to protect you in the future.
はっ！
せいっ！
うああっ！
Forgive me...
Prepare yourself.
I admire your professionalism.
I must ask your forgiveness.
I answer destiny's call!
My apologies...
Heh
Please. Your orders.
Hm? You ought not grow close to me.
In war, a leader may have to forego attachments and send soldiers to die.
It's an old wound. Pay it no mind.
People tell me I'm not much fun to be around. You have my apologies.
Prince Ephraim. Princess Eirika. Please, save Renais.
I will lay down my life to protect you.
Understood.
Your orders.
Hah!
